tool_description: Get all company names within the GaiaLens Dataset
name: GaiaLens Company Names
title: GaiaLens Company Names

api_list.name: getCompanyNames
api_list.description: This API returns a list of all company names available to the user. It can be used as a pre-step before invoking other GaiaLens APIs such as GaiaLens ESG Scores, Gaialens Historical ESG Scores and GaiaLens ESG News.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gaialens-company-names.p.rapidapi.com/companynames"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gaialens-company-names.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gaialens-company-names.p.rapidapi.com/companynames"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gaialens-company-names.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
